Game Launchers: You all know what Steam is.
Epic Games Launcher and GOG launcher. Epic Games Launcher isn't supported. But this is better than even on Windows!
Indie game, assets, jam finding and serving application. Take a look at indie developers games and publish your own.
Serves community installer scripts to automatically configure the Wine environment for required games.
Bottles' Gaming Environment comes preconfigured to support a large set of Windows video games on Linux.
Communication: You all know what Discord is. In this program select to use XOrg over Wayland to be able to stream screen. Unfortunately Discord doesn't support audio streaming and overlay yet.
Third party support for Discord overlay to be able to see who is speaking right now. Highly customizable.
You all know what Team Speak is.
Tools: Simply JoyToKey for Linux. Convert gamepad actions to keyboard or mouse actions.
Joystick, gamepad shortly game controller testing interface for Linux.
Support for optimisations including CPU governor, I/O priority, process niceness, kernel scheduler (SCHED_ISO).
Graphical tweaker for Mangohud and vkBasalt. Highly recommended to use.

Simply Riva Tuner Statistics Server for Linux. Shows FPS, CPU and GPU's usage and heat, RAM and Swap usage etc. To use add <font color="yellow" face="monospace">mangohud</font> on terminal or write <font color="green" face="monospace">mangohud %command%</font> on Steam launch options.

Vulkan post processing layer to enhance the visual graphics of games. To use add <font color="green" face="monospace">mangohud ENABLE_VKBASALT=1</font> on terminal or write <font color="green" face="monospace">mangohud ENABLE_VKBASALT=1 %command%</font> on Steam launch options.
Runtimes: Custom Proton (Wine version by Steam to run games.) by Glorious Eggroll that includes many additional components. Performs better than default Proton. Auto updates Does not require protonup-qt.
Compatibility layer capable of running Windows applications on several POSIX-compliant operating systems.
Open source version of .Net Framework. Required for Windows applications using .Net Framework.
Wine's built-in replacement for Microsoft's Internet Explorer. May be required in some cases.
Graphical interface for script to install various redistributable runtime libraries in Wine.
